_meanings:
{@--1@} A wall, fence, hedge,
anything surrounding or enclosing
another.

{@--5@} The 
circumference or compass in general.

{@--12@} A branch of a
sacred tree to which the sacrificial
victim is tied.

{1} a guard.
{2} an officer attendant on a king or
general (modern ‘aide-de-camp’).
{3} A number of sentinels posted
in a circle.
